songs.title: She Loves Me
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah
Pit fighting in the building
Psycho Les [?]
You know what it is

[Hook]
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
All day every day

[Verse 1]
Listen you can’t turn a jump off
Into your wifey, that’s your loss
I’d rather chase money
And never have to question if she love me
Any motherfucker whispering they wanna rob me
Let a motherfucker try me, try me
We black, heavy metal things
Like my nigga FT we move several things
Got your bitch like “Oh my goodness!”
Probably walk away leaving bloody footprints
I only smoke the good shit and I don’t trust a hood chick
Telling me she love me that’s that bullshit
I don’t want an L [?]
I’m on your girl’s mind when she plays with her dildo
We fight only to make up then make shit right
That’s my bitch for life, that’s why

[Hook]
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
All day every day
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
All day every day

[Verse 2]
She don’t love me, she love my doggy style
Let me call that nigga FT I know he wild
I know he a freak I know he gon’ blow me down
Since I met Les all these hoes know me now
Meet me at the hotel room 304
I might fuck a bitch till she can’t breathe no more
Make her eyes pop out she can’t see no more
You don’t enjoy that’s what you get for being a whore
I got a few addictions first one’s for you to listen
Second one is getting money, third is fucking bitches
Fourth is none of your business
Of course I wasn’t a witness
Taking hunnids and bitches I’m different
I got a military mind
Listen to the words I be killing every line
I’m running with these niggas that killing every time
Girl you don’t love me you wanna fuck me cause I rhyme

[Hook]
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
All day every day
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
All day every day
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
She loves me not
She loves me
All day
